Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to the segregated confinement of pregnant inmates
Summary: Restricts the segregated confinement of pregnant inmates to situations where there are exceptional circumstances which would create an unacceptable risk to other inmates or staff.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the segregated confinement of pregnant inmates
